Rating: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
Reviews: It won't let me see my orders or anything else in my account. It's a pretty slow-running app too. Plus Mango took 4+ weeks to deliver my order. It actually hasn't even shipped yet, I called and they said it will be shipped in a few days and delivered in a week (let's see if that actually happens). Then I got an email after the call, like most stores do after calling customer service, but no apology or request for feedback or anything. The email basically said 'this is a reminder that some of your items will take 18 business days to be delivered like it said when you added them to your cart'. It literally never said that, I was being very careful about shipping times to make sure I get it well before Christmas, and that email was sent 16 business days after I placed my order anyway. So unless they planned on doing 2 day shipping (which they didn't), it's not getting delivered in 18 business days (4+ weeks). In that amount of time, seasonal clothes could become useless. Terrible app and terrible company.

I have to go to other sellers to locate classic women's hoodies. Also, Adidas needs to expand outside of the basic colors in the clothing line. Otherwise, I'm a die hard Adidas fan!

Rating: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

Rating: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
Reviews: So far so good! Nothing bad to say. Simplicity at it's best. See your item, choose it, enter info, and wait.
